sentences.sentence: Hey there, what can I help you with? Another question about my schedule?
Well, I’m usually around in the mornings and noons during the week, except for Wednesday at noon.
I’m here all weekend, no problem with that.
But as for Wednesday noon... it’s personal. I don’t see why that’s relevant to your investigation.
I’m just doing my thing, training and staying fit. Nothing unusual about that.
I can’t tell you why I’m not here on Wednesdays. It’s really none of your business.
But the rest of the time, I’m here, working hard like anyone else.
If you want to know more, you’ll have to ask someone else. I’m not involved in whatever you’re looking for.
